Texts.Eng: An unusual depiction of Kluex, and the accompanying description is strange and full of promise!
Find Clues to Locate the Avian Artifact
The Avian people have a fascinating relationship with their god. These small clues hint towards a bigger truth.
The Great Sovereign Temple... It must be! That's all the information we need. ^#71f2f6;Come back to the Ark whenever you're ready^white;, dear.
The past is full of secrets crying out to be uncovered. Well found, dear!
This looks like an ancient depiction of a star map. Perhaps it plots the location of something important?
This mural describes a great heavenly treasure... Descriptions of the Avian artifact could easily be couched in such terms.
This mural is ancient and uncovers mysteries long since lost.
What a strange statue. And the inscription on the base is even more intriguing than the imagery. The devil is in the detail, dear.
Where would the Avian people of the distant past keep something valuable? Sorry dear, just thinking out loud!
With that last clue we've got all we need to find the Avian artifact! Thank you for all that hard work.
You'd be surprised how much the little things help!
You're quite the collector of Avian antiquities! It appears you've already located enough clues to to allow me to identify the location of the Artifact!

^orange;Avians^reset; next I think! Probably best to ^green;go to planets where ^orange;jungle^white; terrain is in abundance - Avians like to inhabit such places. You'll find those kinds of planets around ^orange;radioactive stars^white;. See you soon, dear. Be careful, and happy hunting!
